Name: EXIT 3 - Painter
About the game: EXIT 3 - Painter is the third episode in our puzzle series. Old-school game play is mixed with polished visuals. There are 60 well designed levels to complete. (50 in campaign + 10 in survival) The goal is seemingly simple: guide the marbles through various obstacles into their corresponding target slots. While this sounds easy the game isn't so much. Devise your solution beforehand and avoid all the traps to succeed. The puzzles are tailored around the ability to paint the marbles. Paint or not to paint, that is the question. Three difficulty levels: • Casual - no time pressure, relaxed bonus requirements • Normal - challenging amount of time for each level • Pro - very sharp times and bonus requirements Features: • Atmospheric 3D environments • Polished visuals • Solid game play • Make your own way though the game : multiple solutions exist for each puzzle • Clear goals, simple game mechanics • Challenge and Survival modes • Achievements • Offers best in class puzzle experience • Catchy music tracks • Multilingual Despite being a puzzle game, it is highly re-playable due to its challenging levels and unique design. Multilingual support has just been released for the game! The following languages are available: English Spanish Portuguese German French Italian Simplified Chinese Korean Japanese Turkish Hungarian Russian Polish
